channel.title: [pi] help please rep++
channel.description:
hey guys i need help with a few things ive been trying to figure it out but for some reason it doesnt work, im using hybrid pvp v3 source and this is my problem,
-i cant change the prices in the shop. -i cant make the npc drop a item that i want. -i cant change the drop rate
if you could help me with this rep++

item.title: [pi] help please rep++
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

  1. Go into prices.txt and find the item ID, then the number next to it is the price.
  2. Go into NPCDrops.tsm then search for your NPC ID and add the item and amount dropped in a code like this “####:#”
  3. Find the NPC ID and it should look like this “####:#” And change the number behind the colon to what you’d like the drop rate to be.

Read full topic
